issues.title: EPIC: Stage 1 — Improve demand forecasting by case type
issues.body:
Window: 10 Nov 2025 → 9 Jan 2026 | Goal: dependable forecasts split by agreed case types with visuals & ranges.

Sub-issues:
- #2 Agree case type definitions & tracking (10–21 Nov 2025)
- #3 Deliver improved forecasting by case type (24 Nov 2025 – 9 Jan 2026)

issues.title: Agree case type definitions & tracking (10–21 Nov 2025)
issues.body:
Scope: agree taxonomy + tracking; update data dictionary & mappings.
Deliverables: /docs taxonomy, ETL mapping, sign-off.
Start: 2025-11-10 | End: 2025-11-21

issues.title: Deliver improved forecasting by case type (24 Nov 2025 – 9 Jan 2026)
issues.body:
Scope: implement forecasting split by case type; validate; publish dashboards.
Deliverables: /src code, CI smoke tests, dashboard.
Start: 2025-11-24 | End: 2026-01-09

issues.title: EPIC: Stage 3A — End-to-end (“concern to court”) with Simul8
issues.body:
Window: 13 Apr 2026 → 31 Jul 2026 | Goal: faster delivery using Simul8 to explore capability, bottlenecks, policy interventions.
Milestone: model ready by 31 Jul 2026.

issues.title: Capability analysis (13 Apr – 8 May 2026) — Simul8
issues.body: Stand up Simul8 baseline; assess system capability. Outputs: baseline build, calibration notes.

issues.title: Identify bottlenecks & re-engineering (11 May – 5 Jun 2026) — Simul8
issues.body: Locate constraints; draft improvements. Outputs: diagnostics, improvement scenarios.

issues.title: Layer policy interventions (8 Jun – 31 Jul 2026) — Simul8
issues.body: Design & test policy levers/prioritisation. Outputs: scenario pack, final model.

issues.title: EPIC: Stage 3B — End-to-end (“concern to court”) with Python DES
issues.body:
Window: 13 Apr 2026 → 25 Sep 2026 | Goal: build Python DES if Simul8 unavailable.
Milestone: model ready by 25 Sep 2026.

issues.title: Capability analysis (13 Apr – 5 Jun 2026) — Python DES
issues.body: Stand up Python DES scaffolding and calibrate. Outputs: /src/sim scaffolding, calibration report.

issues.title: Identify bottlenecks & re-engineering (8 Jun – 14 Aug 2026) — Python DES
issues.body: Run scenarios; propose improvements. Outputs: diagnostics, improvement scenarios.

issues.title: Layer policy interventions (17 Aug – 25 Sep 2026) — Python DES
issues.body: Design & test policy levers/prioritisation. Outputs: scenario pack, final model.
